game_name: Jordan Rudess & Friends in 3D Audio powered by ZYLIA
game_description: Put on your VR goggles and enter the famous Dreamland Recording Studios to take part in the immersive, deep, and emotionally engaging music experience. Jordan Rudess, Steve Horelick, and Jerry Marotta gathered for a spectacular and singular concert which was captured by multiple 360° cameras and ZYLIA 6DoF solution for 3D Audio recording. Thanks to it, you will be able not only to listen tobeautiful performance of fantastic artists but also switch between several 360° vantage spots and spin around in each of them. What’s more, the sound you hear will correspond to your position and movement giving you the most realisticimpressions possible. Stand next to Jordan’s piano or watch in close-up Jerry’s drumming. Look around and admire the majestic space of the former St. John's Church. This will be a truly striking experience that you remember for a long time. By watching this concert you are joining the artists and Zylia to financially support The Audio Engineering Society!
